about_the_game: The GC Kompetition Renault Megane RS RX was built by Prodrive in 2018 and features a number of additional upgrades for the 2019 season. The car features an extremely strong aerodynamic package and has proven itself to be a very stable platform. Chicherit is joined by the experienced Anton Marklund, who will look to continue optimisation of the Renault Megane RS RX.
detailed_description: The GC Kompetition Renault Megane RS RX was built by Prodrive in 2018 and features a number of additional upgrades for the 2019 season. The car features an extremely strong aerodynamic package and has proven itself to be a very stable platform. Chicherit is joined by the experienced Anton Marklund, who will look to continue optimisation of the Renault Megane RS RX.
